events.name: DEFAULT_FACILITY_SLOTS
events.comment: Default number of facility slots that a planet has.

events.name: SECTOR_HEIGHT
events.comment: Height of usable space in the sector.

events.name: SECTOR_WIDTH
events.comment: Width of usable space in the sector.

events.name: ZOOM_TIME
events.comment: Time in seconds for camera zoom to complete.

events.name: GAME_LENGTH_YEARS
events.comment: Game length in "years" -- arbitrary number and duration name for setting rates.

events.name: YEARS_PER_MINUTE
events.comment: Number of game years that elapse per real-world minute.

events.name: WARP_DEPOT_RADIUS
events.comment: Radius in which warp depots provide supply to nearby planets.

events.name: SCAN_SPEED
events.comment: Speed at which scanned area increases per year.

events.name: SCAN_AREA_DEFAULT_SIZE
events.comment: Default height/width of scan area when created.

events.name: SCAN_MAX_SIZE
events.comment: Maximum width/height the scan area grows to (diameter of circle).

events.name: EXPLORE_TIME_YEARS
events.comment: Number of years required for a research station to explore a planet.

events.name: ZOOM_LEVEL_DEFAULT
events.comment: Default level of zoom on sector map.

events.name: ZOOM_LEVEL_PLANET
events.comment: Level of zoom when focused on a planet.

events.name: ZOOM_LEVEL_OVERVIEW
events.comment: Level of zoom when zoomed out to overview mode.

events.name: OVERVIEW_SECTOR
events.comment: Constant for auto-complete representing Sector mode in overview mode.

events.name: OVERVIEW_EXPLORATION
events.comment: Constant for auto-complete representing Exploration mode in overview mode.

events.name: OVERVIEW_SUPPLY
events.comment: Constant for auto-complete representing Supply mode in overview mode.

events.name: DEFAULT_VIEW
events.comment: Empty string to represent default mode vs overview mode.
